information.overview: Twin Striker is a melee DPS class equipped with two powerful axes. A class which deals constant damage and has skills which keeps them alive as long as they deal damage. The class has a combo meter that grants the character bonus damage for every successful attack. Combo meter is X%/130% bonus damage.

skill_tree.name: Brutal Blow
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Launches a rotating slash attack in a wide area in front of you.

skill_tree.name: Fall Impact
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Attacks enemies by leaping forward and landing on the ground.

skill_tree.name: Crimson Blow
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Launches a fire spinning attack that can be charged up to 3 times.

skill_tree.name: Storm Rush
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Makes a forward, two side-by-side attack in a wide area.

skill_tree.name: War Cry
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Grants Super Armor status for a fixed time. (You won’t be staggered when you get hit by enemies in this state).

skill_tree.name: Lava Impact
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Makes an attack by jumping and hitting the ground that can be used up to 3 times in a row. Fire type attack.

skill_tree.name: Burning Rush
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Throws slashes of fire attacking enemies. The combo increases depending on the charge level.

skill_tree.name: Vortex Impact
skill_tree.description: Rushes towards the enemy and rises in the air. Whirl and send the enemy back to the ground.

skill_tree.name: Blood Axe
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.
skill_tree.description: Allows you to absorb HP when you inflict damage to enemies.

skill_tree.name: Beast Swing | Left Click
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.
skill_tree.description: Chain attack, if you press any direction key during the last attack, you will jump into the air, which allows you to use your other skills mid air.

skill_tree.name: Axe Tornado | Right Click
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.
skill_tree.description: Spin attack, which reduces incoming damages while you are spinning and makes you immune to crowd control.
